data.title: Dirk Paessler on LinkedIn: In my conversation with Kais Baker from Turn
data.meta_description: In my conversation with Kais Baker from Turn/River Capital we talked about the story of Paessler GmbH, the company I founded in 1997 and which we were able toâ€¦
data.text:
Meet CurbTek: A Shreveport Business revolutionizing vehicle maintenance services. Shreveport native, Dalton Dean has created a better way to take care of general maintenance needs of your vehicle. However, he's not new to the entrepreneurial scene. In this week's episode of On The Cusp, Dalton chats with us about his successes and failures and why he believes that no matter how big the sting of failure is, you've got to keep swingin'. Tune in!

We couldnâ€™t be more happy for Heather K. Margolis as she embarks on her next entrepreneurial journey. What's fantastic is that she'll continue to work hand-in-hand with 360insights as a partner! These changes are perfectly aligned with our vision to redefine the architecture of business collaboration through the upcoming launch of 360insights Ecosystems. With Heather's deep understanding of this strategy, we can't wait to work alongside her to make it a reality. Learn more: #360insights #ChannelMarketing #PartnerMarketing #360Ecosystems

Are you ready to elevate your entrepreneurial journey to new heights with The Gap and the Gain, Who Not How, and 10x Is Easier Than 2x? The Transformation Trilogy is your essential guide to success! Unleash your potential, supercharge your success, and achieve more by doing less. Together, we're paving the way to entrepreneurial excellence. ğŸŒŸ https://lnkd.in/eiyQdC-6

It is so important to know your Value Proposition; how to step away from the noise and focus on your core values, offering, and messaging. This will not only make it easier to market your businesses, it will also make your customers or clients feel safe in your space. When was the last time you looked at your Value Proposition?
